definition: to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll

sentences.english: Can we also order some vegetable spring rolls?
The breads are horrible and stale and other foods on offer, e. g. spring rolls are served cold.
sentences.chinese: 還有難喫的，不新鮮的麪包和其他食物，比如冷春捲。

sentences.english: Deep-fry the spring rolls until golden.
What do you think, Alice? Let's have some spring rolls.
sentences.chinese: 艾麗斯，你認爲呢？讓我們喫一些春捲吧。

sentences.english: The host Lee Sheung Ching learnt to cook Vietnamese spring rolls.
sentences.chinese: 主持李尚正向當地廚師賜教，學煑越式春捲。

sentences.english: In China, spring rolls are small witha thin, delicate wrapper.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，春捲是一道外皮小而薄，美味絕口。

sentences.english: In Chinese cuisine, egg rolls differ from the spring roll.
sentences.chinese: 在中菜裏，蛋卷與春捲不同。

sentences.english: We only have spring rolls today for take-out .
sentences.chinese: 今天我們的外帶食物只有春捲。

sentences.english: Their tastes vary with the fillings, either sweet or salty.
sentences.chinese: 春捲由於其多樣的餡料而呈現多種口感，有甜有鹹。

sentences.english: She uses a fork and she double-dips her egg rolls.
sentences.chinese: 她用的是叉子而且喫蛋皮春捲要蘸兩次醬。

sentences.english: This is an amazing keyboard that can be rolled up easy.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個神奇的鍵盤，可以像春捲那樣捲起來。

sentences.english: Spring Roll, Roast Duck, Marinated Jellyfish, Mini Octopus, Crab Dates.
sentences.chinese: 春捲，燒鴨，海哲，八爪魚，蟹棗。

sentences.english: Each place all has the different spring roll manufacture method and the taste characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地皆有差別的豆沙春捲製作方法和口味特點。

sentences.english: Spring Rolls Stuffed with Shrimps and roast beef are very tasty, being the house cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 鮮蝦春捲和炭燒牛肉味道很好，是這兒的招牌小喫。

sentences.english: I'll have two spring rolls and a portion of congee.
sentences.chinese: 我要兩個春捲和一份廣式肉粥。

definition: soft mixed vegetable and meat roll-up
fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
to get or supply meals for a monthly rate/to board/to cater
ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan
gimbap (Korean rice roll similar in appearance to sushi)/kimbap
rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
hot and sour soup/sour and spicy soup
